name: Avoid PLI Procedures & Functions with a very low comment/code ratio (PL1)
description:
This rule searches for all the PLI Procedures or Functions having a very low comment/code ratio. PLI procedures or functions should have at least a ratio comment/code > X %
The threshold is a parameter and can be changed at will. The default parameter value is 5 percent. Undocumented artifacts are not considered for violation in this QR.
output:
The report lists all the PLI Procedures  and PLI Functions with a very low comment/code ratio.

It provides following information: 
-  PLI Procedures and PLC Function full name
rationale: Maintainability of the code is facilitated if there is documentation in the code. This rule will ensure there are comments within the Artifact
remediation: Document your source code in order to keep a  satisfactory comment/code ratio.
total: Number of PLI  Procedures and Functions
alternativeName: Avoid PLI Procedures & Functions with a very low comment/code ratio (PL1)
